document_data.mainbody:
ilvin was a hawk who served as the companion of the wemic Kreston in the 14 century DR. The two shared an empathic link with one another and Silvin was affected by Krestons druidic magic provided they were in close enough proximity.
As Silvin could in a manner communicate with Kreston, he acted as a scout for the Golden Mane pride, providing them with reconnaissance from the skies.
